cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and hot! I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I come out every morning!
🔥 I am very, very hot.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me!

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you can see me at night. Sometimes I am full, sometimes I am just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like me!
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese.
🌑 I change shape but am always round-ish.

cosmos.question: I am a bright light in the night sky, far, far away. I twinkle! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ Wish upon me!
🌌 Many of me make up constellations.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me really well.

cosmos.question: I am where you live! I have water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants grow on me.
🏠 You have a house on me.
🌎 I am a planet!

cosmos.question: These are big groups of stars that make pictures in the sky. What are they?

hints.text: 🐻 One is shaped like a bear!
♐ Another is shaped like an archer.
🌠 They can help people navigate.

cosmos.question: I go around the Sun! I am red and rocky. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 The same color as chocolate!
🚀 People might visit me one day.
👽 Some stories say aliens live on me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas far, far away. I am the biggest planet in our solar system! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have a big red spot!
💨 Made of swirling clouds.
💪 I am really, really big!

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me! I am another planet far away. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
✨ You can see my rings with a telescope.
🪐 I am a gas giant with rings.

cosmos.question: It's like a big road made of stars and dust in the night sky. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 Some people think I look like spilled milk.
🌌 I am a group of billions of stars.
🌀 I am a spiral galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am a vehicle that takes people into space! What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🚀 I am very fast!
✨ I can orbit Earth!

animal.question: I say 'meow' and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I say 'woof' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🎾 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I am a man's best friend.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I like to swim in the pond.
🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I eat grass in a field.
🥛 My milk is good for you.
⚫ I have black and white spots.

animal.question: I oink and love to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐖 I have a curly tail.
🍓 I like to eat fruits and vegetables.
🐷 I am pink and round.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I have a fluffy tail.
🌿 I like to hop around in the grass.

animal.question: I cluck and lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 People eat my eggs for breakfast.
🐛 I like to eat bugs.
🐔 I say 'cluck, cluck' in the farm.

animal.question: I neigh and like to run. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 People can ride on me.
🥕 I like to eat hay and apples.
🐎 I have a long mane.

animal.question: I swim in the sea and have scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live underwater.
🫧 I breathe with gills.
🎣 Some people catch me for food.

animal.question: I say 'baa' and have wool. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 My wool keeps you warm.
🌿 I eat grass in a field.
🐑 I am often white and fluffy.
